hero.everySucculent: Every succulent you buy helps rebuild a kibbutz affected by October 7.

whoWe.story:
Planto was born where only the succulents survived. After the tragic events of October 7, in our kibbutz near the border, only these small but resilient plants remained alive. We saw it as a sign and began to rebuild life from them. Today, every succulent we grow and sell helps us rebuild our home, our community, and our hope.
We invite you to become part of this story.

reviews.review1: We were looking for something thoughtful for our team — and Planto delivered beyond expectations. Every succulent came with a story, and knowing that our gesture supported the rebuilding of a kibbutz made it truly meaningful.
reviews.review2: We ordered Planto sets for our remote team to celebrate a project launch. They were beautiful, easy to care for, and came with a message that touched everyone. It’s rare to find a gift that combines aesthetics and impact.
reviews.positionReview2: People & Culture Lead, Cisco Tel Aviv
reviews.review3: Our company loved the idea of gifts that grow — and the story behind Planto made it even more powerful. We believe in resilience and creativity, and Planto reflects that perfectly.
reviews.review4: We gave Planto succulents to our partners and clients this year, and the feedback was fantastic. The packaging, the quality — and especially the cause — made it stand out from anything we’ve sent before. — Tomer B., Partnerships Manager, Yad2
reviews.review5: The team loved receiving something alive, symbolic, and rooted in something real. The fact that our order helped support a recovering community added real value to what could’ve been just another corporate gift.
reviews.review6: Instead of sending branded mugs or pens, we sent Planto boxes. The response was overwhelming — everyone loved the plants and appreciated the social impact. We’ll definitely come back for our next cohort.
